medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started acutely around 11 am, initially located around the umbilicus then moving across the mid abdomen. The pain has been ongoing for 10 hours, associated with nausea and dry heaves but no vomiting. Patient had a non-bloody bowel movement this morning and denies melena. Endorses some subjective chills and sweating.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary artery disease (CAD), hypertension (HTN), hyperlipidemia (HLD), previous hand surgery, coronary artery bypass grafting (CABG) x4.
